item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 12, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. I deleted my social media accounts (and why you should too) (53 points | 25 comments)
2. Qubes OS: A reasonably secure operating system (19 points | 1 comment)
3. Uv's killer feature is pulling in local dependencies (193 points | 140 comments)
4. Bad Apple but it's 6,500 regexes that I search for in Vim (324 points | 38 comments)
5. Tabby: Self-hosted AI coding assistant (88 points | 18 comments)
6. Backdooring Your Backdoors – Another $20 Domain, More Governments (230 points | 12 comments)
7. FurtherAI (YC W24) Is Hiring Across Research, Engineering, and Design ( | hide)
8. From ASCII to ASIC: Porting donut.c to a tiny slice of silicon (72 points | 9 comments)
9. Mac Mini G4 – The best « classic » Macintosh for retro-gaming? (124 points | 61 comments)
10. Northeastern's redesign of the Khoury curriculum abandons the fundamentals of CS (17 points | 6 comments)
11. James Shore: The Best Product Engineering Org in the World (64 points | 23 comments)
12. Pushing the whole company into the past on purpose (110 points | 27 comments)
13. Microsoft Bob: Microsoft's biggest flop of the 1990s (27 points | 34 comments)
14. The Canva outage: another tale of saturation and resilience (13 points | discuss)
15. Snake Game in 56 Bytes (64 points | 5 comments)
16. Norms-Based Intellectual Property Systems: The Case of French Chefs(2008) (10 points | 6 comments)
17. Best Pens for 2025 (90 points | 34 comments)
18. It's time to abandon the cargo cult metaphor (34 points | 32 comments)
19. I spent 18 years in the Linux console (142 points | 109 comments)
20. Why the Getty Center Is the Safest Place for Art During a Fire (2019) (57 points | 30 comments)
21. Ripping Sega System 16 Sprites and Palettes: Brief Guide (2021) (30 points | discuss)
22. Great CPAN modules released last week (46 points | 8 comments)
23. Russia's Hidden War Debt (36 points | 21 comments)
24. Why I Chose Common Lisp (320 points | 143 comments)
25. Why Rust nextest is process-per-test (88 points | 26 comments)
26. The mistake of yearning for the 'friendly' online world of 20 years ago (68 points | 67 comments)
27. Narcolepsy is weird but I didn't notice (208 points | 70 comments)
28. Link Blog in a Static Site (33 points | 9 comments)
29. Decentralized Syndication – The Missing Internet Protocol (115 points | 75 comments)
30. Visualizing Joyce's Ulysses: "Sirens" as a Graphic Score (7 points | discuss)
